selected_skills.name: calc_numeric
selected_skills.purpose: Calculate the measure of angle ∠C using the given angles and the sum property.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use calc_numeric to compute the measure of angle ∠C by subtracting the given angles from 360 degrees.

selected_skills.name: map_length_to_option
selected_skills.purpose: Map the calculated angle to one of the provided options.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use map_length_to_option to match the calculated angle with the closest option provided in the multiple-choice answers.
